lines.text: Happy Birthday, Stuart! Do you remember which aunt I am?
The alcoholic?
No...
The one who lives with her "FRIEND", Linda?
No...
Then you must be the ugly one.
Stuart, apologize to your Aunt Noreen!
I'm sorry you're ugly.
So what'd you guys do last night?
Me and the guys from the Crew team went skinny dipping in the lake under the moonlight.
Solid. Yeah, me and some of my lacrosse buddies went to the old hunting lodge and took showers together.
I played touch football in a wheat field with my girlfriend and 13 guys from the water polo team. Then she split and we gave each other hand jobs.
Stuart, what does mama say about little boys who eavesdrop?
Little boys who eavesdrop deserve to know the truth, and the truth is usually devastating.
Goddddddd, that's cute.
Stuart, this is your first time in a Chinese restaurant! Isn't this fun?
The waiter's face looked weird!
Well, that's because he's Asian...

[slight pause]
Where did his eyes go?
What do you want to eat?
A Happy Meal!
Stuart, this is a Chinese restaurant. They don't make the Happy Meal!

[growling]
Then I hate the Chinese!
STUART! That kind of talk is racist! What does Momma say about little boys who are racist?
Little boys who are racist learn to be racist from their mother!

[nods]
That's righ-
[stands up]
Oh! Ohh! Stuart, I've never said anything racist in front of you!

[nods]
Hmm-hmm! You said that Canadians are wussies. And that black people are not scary if they keep their hair neat.
Oh! Okay...
The French are smelly and can't fight...
He look-a like-a man.

[Vancome Lady is in a coma]
It's hard to tell how much work she had done. I'm gonna need a chisel to get all that makeup off.

[thinking]
Watch it there, Moesha. I may be a coma but I'm not deaf.
Damn, this flight makes more stops than R. Kelly's limo in a preschool parking lot.
God bless Southwest Airlines, the ghetto bus of the sky.
Dooooooon't.
Where did his eyes go?
Well Stuart, they didn't go anywhere, honey. They're just a different shape!
They look like this!
[takes his fingers to his face and presses his eyes together to resemble an Asian]
Well, that's the way God made 'em. Just like he gave you the lazy eye!
I don't have a lazy eye!
Ohh! Yes you do!
Well, you have gray hair in your danger zone!
STUART! Did you peek at Mommy when she was changing again?

[to female co-worker]
Haha, take it like a man.

[to same woman]
Yeah, you look like you take it like a man.
[at a Jamba Juice-like store]
I can't believe you don't have a problem with what you did.
And I can't believe you just spent $6 on some orange juice that took a trip around the blender with ice.
You were great in "Chicago".
Thank you, that means a lot.
I know what "thank you" means.
Shaaa... You know what?
[while on the show "Malcolm X in the Middle"]
You wanna know what the worst part about childhood is? White people.

[to a white tricker-or-treater dressed as a hooded ghost]
Hurry up, Blondie, you don't wanna be late to the Hitler Youth Convention.

[to a black tricker-or-treater dressed as a jailbird]
Oh, and young man, my car has low-jack.
Stuart's father left us on Tues-dee.

[coughing noise]
Uh-uh-uh.
[at a Disney party making Disney jokes]

OK, so one morning, Mickey wakes up and looks outside. He sees "Mickey Sucks" written in urine. Mickey calls the police and they say they have bad news and they have worse news. The bad news is that the urine is Pluto's. The worse news is that it's Minnie's handwriting.
When you watch Mad TV, it's like making love to us with your remote control.
What's up with all you white people? Ya'll got no asses! It's like God said, "I'm gonna take your asses and give 'em to the black people!" See...
[turns around]
We've got TWO asses!
Look what I can do!
Have you ever been arrested?
Well...
Well what?

Well, last March my cousin accused me of stealing her baby. I just wanted to hold it, for a few days, in Mexico, rename it, cut and dye its hair, tattoo things on its pretty little toes. It was all just a huge mistake
Now turn and face the camera.
Live from New York...
No! That's the wrong show.
We were supposed to get Dr. Bill Cosby here today, but instead we got this anonymous bitch.
Hey, hey, hey, I got a name. It's Rogaine. Rogaine Ephedra-Free Washington. Oh, and I'm not a bitch, I'm a ho. Bitch don't get paid.
Stay away from my Danger Zone!

[in an Antiques Roadshow parody, after being told her plate is worth $6]
Alright fine, but let me tell you something. I'll take the $6 then.
I'm not interested in buying it.
No, no it's okay, I'll take the six.
No, no ma'am, I'm the appraiser, I'm not the buyer
Then why you offer me $6?
No, I didn't.
Yes you did!
No I didn't.
Yes you did! Yes you did! Yes you did! Oh, so what am I a liar now? I'm a liar! She just called me a liar! I'm some dumb stupid liar. I'm just some dumb stupid lying bitch!
Ma'am I did not call you any of those names.
So she gonna say I'm deaf. I'm deaf! I'm some dumb stupid lying deaf bitch with a six dollar dinner plate!
Was he a black man or a white man?
You know... black-a like you, black-a like me.
Now see, that is why I never did buy a gun is because I just don't think shooting yourself sounds like any fun!
Lady, I didn't do it on purpose.
You didn't? Well, now, let me ask you a question... do you have a television?
Yes.
Have you ever seen this TV show? It's called "The News"...?
I don't get it!

[Pretty White Kids with Problems]
Tad, that's very interesting but i can't kiss you!
[music comes to a halt]
Even though we are the same age...
That's right. We're both fifteen.

[adding emphasis]
That's right.

Hey guess what. There's a show on ABC called Rodney starring Rodney Carrington that just got picked up for another season. Hey, Rodney got picked up for another season! Yeah! Honk your horn! Hey I got a question, who the fuck is Rodney Carrington?

[Responding to any question]
I have a cat named Cece.
[filming the Blair Witch report]
I'm Diane Sawyer. I'm all alone now, and I'm scared. I continue to hear voices all around me.
[off in the distance]
I'm Ted Koppel.
[while roller-blading]
Lee-Lee, your hands are on my tetas.
Stupid, if I let go of your tetas, you gonna fall.
Ok, you can keep 'em there.
[under her breath]
Lesbiana...
Who the hell is Count-less Va-john?
It's actually Countess Vaughn. I'm on "The Parkers", it's on the UPN.
You on the UPN? That explains why I ain't never seen't you.
Serpentine.
I'm Connie Chung. If you're watching this, it means I'm back on the air. Or you're Maury and this is in the background while Suki and I play our bath tub games.

[in a Chinese restaurant]
Well, do you know what you want to eat?
A happy meal.
Stuart, it's a Chinese restaurant, they don't make the happy meal.

[growling]
Then I hate the Chinese.
Look how little my gloves are!
Stuart, I have never said anything racist in front of you.
Mmmhmmm, you said that Canadians are wusses and that black people aren't scary as long as they keep their hair neat. French are smelly and can't fight... oh, and you said that the Chinese were ugly.
My dream is to go swimming in my Hallowe'en costume.

[competing on Hollywood Squares]
If UPN ain't got no stars, they shouldn't have done this f***in' show. Can't believe they couldn't get Mo'Nique too busy to do this? LisaRaye, where the hell she at?
Year and make of the car, please.
It's a 2003 Earth Destroyer.
[in a remake of the Helen Keller movie]
Helen, your new teacher is here. Oh I forgot, you're deaf.
Shelly.
What?

[lowering voice]
Shelly.
[pauses and takes a drink]
C'MON.
Carol Finney! Tell us something about yourself, and *not* something I've already said!
Well, I like to roll nickels... I have a windmill magnet collection... my daughter's my best friend.
Well I hope your husband is a close second!
Well he would be if he'd help me roll nickels!
[the Terminator has been sent back in time to protect Jesus]
Look, you can't go around killing people all the time.
Why?
You just can't.
Why?
Forgive him, Father. He's a robot from the future.
Oh, I'm not white. I'm Navajo.
Well I'm not a ho, either!
So who do you think is the biggest phony here tonight?
You are.
If you don't put the pudding back in the fridge, you are a dumb person.
And don't forget to buy my book, "Gone With the Wind... My Ass! Hollywood... and the White Man's Lies".
Damn, that's an angry bitch.
You like? I like!
Yeah, okay, I tell you everything.
Will you shut up? I swear to God I'm gonna cut off your head and throw it right in your face if you don't shut up and listen to me!
Okay, Stuart. Have you practiced?
Hm hmm.
You're not lying to me are you, Stuart?

[evil voice]
If I said I did it, I did it!
My mom said it's okay to talk to lesbians because they take good care of their cats and have a can-do attitude.
That is so awful for your father to be dying of cancer. It's just horrible. Now... can I ask you a question? Was he a smoker?
Um, yes. Yes, he was.

Well then I just don't understand how he could be surprised. I mean it says it right there on the side of the box, doesn't it? "Smoking Causes Cancer." I know 'cause I've seen it on there. Now... can I ask you a question? Can your father read?
Of course he can read!
Well, I just thought maybe he was illiterate and that was why he was surprised when he got cancer. Because it does say right there on the box...

[in reference to her chest]
Do you like Mama's meatbags baby?
Mom?
You get old enough I'm gonna letcha touch em'

[everyone dances to Dancing Queen, and everything freezes]
What the hell?
VD is everywhere, and chances are you'll probably wind up getting it someday.
I think that marriage is back because love is back. It was all weird when love was gone. I think love was gone because we made fun of it. We called it fat and stupid. So don't make fun of love!
Hey Drew Barrymore, Anne Heche called and said you're spaceship's ready!

[gasps]
E.T.'s here?
lmnop isn't one letter, it's like - seven or ten!

[talking to the Tooth Fairy]
Don't jump on the bed. My mom says only Italians do that.
What does mama say about the smoking?
Smoking is for Europeans and white trash.
What does mama say about sliding down the banister?
Don't slide down the banister because you'll injure your googoo and that's all some men have going for them.
What does mama say about little boys who aren't polite?
Little boys who aren't polite give the pro-choice a better reason to exist.
What does mama say about lying?
Little boys who lie should expect tragedy to visit them on a regular basis.

[to Micheal Jackson on All-Star American Idol]
Jacko, freak of nature... yes. Pedofile... yes. She-male... yes.
[pause]
American Idol, no.

[to the camera]
I don't wanna be here. I wanna be on Friends.
So, Stuart, I hear your dad left on a Thursday, huh?
Um-hum.
Well, how does that makes you feel?

[suspiciously]
Why?
Well, I grew up without a father too and I just wanted to tell you... You know, sweetie, it's not your fault.

[pushes Brenda off the couch with his feet]
Aaaaahhh!
Stuart, that was not very nice.

[reaching out his foot towards Brenda]
Say that into the microphone!
If I do, will we be friends?

[putting his foot in front of his mouth, sing-songy]
I don't know.
Well, I don't need to be your friend, then. I'll just sit here and read a magazine.
Where's Mr. Pip's goo-goo?
His what?
His goo-goo. His goo-goo's not there.
I'm sorry, I don't understand...
Well, he's talking about his goo-goo, his ding-a-ling, duh!
Lord, I hope they never make ''The Honeymooners 2''.

[while stuffing his maid's face with cake]
You're like a little Latino sponge, sucking up what you like to have.

[looks into the camera]
What the frick? Is that a camera?
[draws a gun and shoots the camera]
What does mama say about swearing?
Mama says, little boys who swear grow up to Democrats.
You have taken my love of music and ripped it to shreads, pissed on it, and threw it in a dumpster...
[pause]
... pulled it out of the dumpster, raped it, aborted it, and cooked it in a stew and then spoon fed it back to me!
Where are the strawberries?

[a t-ball coach teaching Stuart to swing]
Now, Stuart, you have to get angry and swing at the ball. What makes you angry , Stuart?

[eyes narrow, voice becomes a growling whisper]
The *world*.
If you married Darth Vader, you would be Ella Vader.
I'm an only child, and I always wanted to be a part of a big family.
Then you are stupid.
Maybe I can win Texas, but I can't win your love. And Texas doesn't look good naked.

[in the opening credits]
It's Mad TV!
Don't make me break my foot off of yo ass!
It was crazy as hell, man! Pandemonium 2004!
It's so hot...
And hard to think!
Don't you want a Fanta?
Ask me how I feel, come on, ask me how I feel.

[imitating Ricky]
Okay, how do you feel?
I feel crazy, man!
Finally, I was like Korean babies are too stressful. So, I sent him back to China, or where ever Korean babies come from.
Let me do it.
How many times has this happened to you?
Lord, I hope they never make ''The Honeymooners 2''.
